title: What is your thinking? please tell me, I'm genuinely interested.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
This has been every game yesterday, and will be for the foreseeable future.

Speaking to the majority of low elo here:
I just want to know what your actual thinking is, surely you can't be thinking:

"OMG Faker played this champ! This means... omg! That... are you ready? omg! That If I play this hard champ that I've never even seen before, let alone played. With a mastery that is only relevant to the pro's in mid lane... that... I will  actually become Faker! OMG!"

So if thats not what you're thinking... Why do 50% of bronze/silver feel the need to incessantly play champions that the winning team plays?
Like seriously, there is no reason to do it, so how come for the next month Victor and Ori will be the main low elo champs for the next month or two.


Im saying now that I ain't touching mid lane for a while, i ain't versing no Viktor plague.

replies.body: I've loved Orianna since I started playing, I think she's really easy to pick up honestly.

No one played yasuo at worlds yet hes still in every game on my team feeding hard

To many sheeple in this community

I got yas in my teemoing shop with project

IF YOU CANT BEAT EM, JOIN EM

play him a lot

dont actually feed

but an ez ass champ tho.
Viktor and Orianna is fine because lots of people were playing them long before this worlds. What i'm annoyed with is miss fortune support

O-O played with 4 already.

IN NORMALS!
NOONE IN NORMALS (EXCEPT ME) WATCHES ESPORTS

I played Orianna long before worlds but I did have a game vs a victor who absolutely sucked, gave me 3 free kills in like 10 minutes.

I just hope miss fortune support is gone now atleast.
